org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.scanner
Class AeScanEvent

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.scanner.AeScanEvent
public class AeScanEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Event fired by the AeDirectoryScanner to indicate that there has been a change in the watch list.

Field Summary

          File has been added constant.
private  int mType
          change type (either REMOVAL or ADDITION)

private  java.lang.Object mUserData
